name: Loan Application DApp
description: A Loan Application Powered by Blockchain

BLOCKCHAIN_SERVICE_URL.description: Use the Heroku App URL that has the Blockchain Add-On deployed and add '/blockchain' to that(ie. http://your-appname-here.herokuapp.com/blockchain)

LOANPROGRAM_CONTRACT_ID.description: The loan program (smart contract) id you deployed through Add-On Admin.refer to the Add-on documentation for more.
